Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quiz

  •  class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds a whole quiz and its data.
    Version:
    2.0, June 10 2013
    Author:
    Richard shi

      • SaveQuiz

        public static void SaveQuiz(java.lang.String fileName,
            Quiz quiz)
        Saves the current list of Quizzes into the XML file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of quiz File.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        marshaller: Reference variable for Marshaller. Reads in data from a Quiz class and saves it to the XML file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String reference variable. Holds the filename of the file to save to.
        quiz - Reference variable for Quiz. Holds the class to get data from to save to file.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.

      • LoadQuiz

        public static Quiz LoadQuiz(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads the current quiz from file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of quiz file.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        unmarshaller: Reference variable for Unmarshaller. Reads in data from a quiz XML file and loads it into a Quiz class.

        quiz: Reference Variable for Quiz. Holds class to load data into.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String reference variable. Holds the filename of the file to load from.
        Returns:
        Quiz class with data loaded in.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.
